title: 4-Signal Mega Stack
mechanism: STACK 4 WEAK SIGNALS TOGETHER: Combine leverage variance (S013 base) + weekend timing + whale presence + round-size trades. Each signal alone may be weak, but all 4 together might create strong conviction.

proposed_signal.condition: lev_std < 0.7 AND is_weekend AND has_whale_trade AND has_round_size_trade AND no_ratio > 0.6

novelty_vs_tested: Individual signals tested, combination never tested
